title: Enchanting Pushpa Jhumkas: Diamond and Gemstone Floral Earrings
materials: and various other gemstones (12.06ct total). The setting features a secure prong setting and subtle filigree detailing. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: These exquisite jhumkas feature a cascading floral design, reminiscent of blooming jasmine and lotus flowers. Each petal is encrusted with sparkling diamonds and vibrant gemstones. The design incorporates a modern aesthetic while retaining a touch of traditional South Indian elegance, mirroring temple jewelry motifs in a contemporary manner. The floral arrangement showcases exceptional detail and craftsmanship.
colors: Rose Gold hue complementing the soft pinks of the Tourmaline
and the dazzling white of the diamonds. A harmonious blend of pastel shades creates a delicate and captivating look
representative of traditional South Indian color palettes.
occasions: or as a statement piece for upscale events. These jhumkas add a touch of sophistication to both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
and modern outfits. Also suitable for gifting during Voni Function or as a treasured family heirloom.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and modern design. The high-quality diamonds and gemstones ensure lasting brilliance, while the intricate floral design adds a touch of timeless elegance. These jhumkas are not just jewelry; they are a statement of exquisite taste and cultural appreciation.
